column2: - Essentially a workflow with no transitions, but has a Published state, so portlets and applications that expect that state will continue to work.
Final draft of research has been accepted and is now ready for production
Research is being drafted in preperation for a review
Research is being reviewed by an external body
Research is in production ready to be published somewhere
Research is being reviewed by an internal group
Research is being reviewed by a peer review process
Research is being prepared for proposal
Research has been proposed and is being considered
Research proposal has been rejected and will not be proceeded
Research was accepted and starts the draft process
Research was accepted by the review process and is complete ready for production for publication
Research was submitted for an external review
Research was submitted for an internal review
Research was submitted for a peer review
Research is complete and has gone into production
Research has been submitted for initial consideration
Research was reviewed and a redraft has been requested
Research was rejected at some point in the process
A previously rejected research proposal was retrieved to be reproposed
